page.title: 18Shopping Parade/Darras Hall
page.content:
The shopping parade has the following units:Newsagent,Supermarket,Bakery, Hairdresser,Launderette,Cafe,Butcher, Building Society,Fancy Goods,Chemist, Hardware,Off-License,Clothes and Shoe Shop.Near to this parade is a large filling station with garage facilities and car showroom.
Only 2 market gardens are still in business ,both only a short distance from the shops.There is also a local dairy and driving school.
Adjacent to the shopping parade are premises of a dentist and doctor's surgery.
Another market garden and landscape gardener business operates from the rural area of{Medburn. }
